snippet: Generali, the biggest Italian insurer, has agreed to buy the remaining stake in an Eastern European joint venture it does not already own for $3.3 billion.
abstract: Generali, the biggest Italian insurer, has agreed to buy the remaining stake in an Eastern European joint venture it does not already own for $3.3 billion.

headline.main: Generali to Buy Stake in Joint Venture for $3.3 Billion
